name: Zodiac Rush
description:
Zodiac Rush determines your REAL star sign!

Follow the path and be HONEST to find out which sign of the Zodiac is closest to your personality. Do you believe in astrology? Did the game guess your star sign? Do you know your REAL birthday?

You can also have fun by throwing random moves and trying to become every sign. Each character is unique and packed with astrological traits. Develop a new style and show your personality with fashion!

Replay it time and time again—you might get different results. For the best accuracy, play 100 times and add up the scores! Then compare with your friends… but don’t lie.

Let your soul come ALIVE with Zodiac Rush today!

Features
* All 12 signs fully realized as avatars
* Easy gameplay—no mistakes
* Gives you REAL answers
* Simple questions encourage YOUR interpretation
